author: Jack Otway
title: Manchester United News: Zlatan Ibrahimovic pays tribute to Fabio Capello | Football | Sport | Express.co.uk
text:
Manchester United star Zlatan Ibrahimovic: This man inspired my successful career MANCHESTER UNITED star Zlatan Ibrahimovic has revealed the inspiration behind his great career. PUBLISHED: PUBLISHED: 05:40, Tue, Feb 21, 2017 
Ibrahimovic is currently taking the Premier League by storm with Manchester United . 
The former Sweden international has bagged an impressive 24 goals during his first season in English football. 
He is aiming to win more trophies after conquering the likes of Holland, Italy, Spain and France throughout his career. 
During that time he has established himself as one of the planet's best strikers. 
And Ibrahimovic has hinted former England boss Fabio Capello revolutionised his game. GETTY Zlatan Ibrahimovic has scored 24 goals for Manchester United this season GETTY Zlatan Ibrahimovic is one of the world's best strikers Zlatan Ibrahimovic and Henrikh Mkhitaryan dinner date Thu, January 19, 2017
